Uses of Package
com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features

  • Packages that use com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane
    Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser.features
    Various features specific to the dependency parsing phase.
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the (PosTagger).
    It tags based on a previously constructed classificaton model, converting the model's outcomes to PosTag using the currently set PosTagSet.
    The PosTagSet is set via TalismaneSession.setPosTagSet(PosTagSet).
    The pos-tagger prodces a PosTagSequence which is a list of PosTaggedToken.
    It can be evaluated via a PosTaggerEvaluator.
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features
    Various features specific to the pos-tagging phase.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features used by com.joliciel.talismane 
    Class and Description
    PosTaggerFeature
    An interface for features which depend on the current PosTaggerContext, that is, the history of decisions already taken by the POS tagger.
    PosTaggerFeatureServiceLocator 
    PosTaggerRule
    A PosTaggerRule is specified by a boolean feature and a PosTag.
    If the boolean feature evaluates to true, the token will automatically be assigned the PosTag in question, without taking any further decisions.
    Negative rules are also possible: in this case, the PosTag in question is eliminated from the set of possible PosTags (unless no other PosTags are possible).
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features used by com.joliciel.talismane.parser.features 
    Class and Description
    PosTaggedTokenAddressFunction 
    PosTaggedTokenWrapper
    A simple wrapper for a pos-tagged token, useful to allow multiple feature contexts to act all as a PosTaggedToken for PosTaggedToken features.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features used by com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger 
    Class and Description
    PosTaggedTokenWrapper
    A simple wrapper for a pos-tagged token, useful to allow multiple feature contexts to act all as a PosTaggedToken for PosTaggedToken features.
    PosTaggerContext
    The PosTagger's current context, including the history of decisions taken by the POS tagger so far.
    PosTaggerFeature
    An interface for features which depend on the current PosTaggerContext, that is, the history of decisions already taken by the POS tagger.
    PosTaggerRule
    A PosTaggerRule is specified by a boolean feature and a PosTag.
    If the boolean feature evaluates to true, the token will automatically be assigned the PosTag in question, without taking any further decisions.
    Negative rules are also possible: in this case, the PosTag in question is eliminated from the set of possible PosTags (unless no other PosTags are possible).
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features used by com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features 
    Class and Description
    AbstractPosTaggedTokenFeature
    An Abstract base class for features applied to a given pos-tagged token.
    AbstractPosTaggerFeature
    An Abstract base class for features which depend on the current PosTaggerContext, that is, the history of decisions already taken by the POS tagger.
    PosTaggedTokenAddressFunction 
    PosTaggedTokenFeature
    A feature defined on a pos-tagged token, which can either be used when pos-tagging on the history of the current task, or when parsing, after referring to an individual pos-tag.
    PosTaggedTokenWrapper
    A simple wrapper for a pos-tagged token, useful to allow multiple feature contexts to act all as a PosTaggedToken for PosTaggedToken features.
    PosTaggerContext
    The PosTagger's current context, including the history of decisions taken by the POS tagger so far.
    PosTaggerFeature
    An interface for features which depend on the current PosTaggerContext, that is, the history of decisions already taken by the POS tagger.
    PosTaggerFeatureService 
    PosTaggerRule
    A PosTaggerRule is specified by a boolean feature and a PosTag.
    If the boolean feature evaluates to true, the token will automatically be assigned the PosTag in question, without taking any further decisions.
    Negative rules are also possible: in this case, the PosTag in question is eliminated from the set of possible PosTags (unless no other PosTags are possible).
